_header: O fair madame all though that there be none

BLHar682.First Lines:
O ffayre madame allþough þat þer be noonThat for him
                    silf kan speke so yvil as y…
BLHar682.Last Lines:
…Yet neuyrtheles but ye had cause of whiMake me not lest of
                    euery othir on
BLHar682.Note: As written, repeats first words of lines 1-2 at end to indicate going back to first four lines of the roundel.
